partners.laCantera: They are constantly evolving in order to offer the best services and personalized attention to their customers. They are open to the public beginning at 7:00h in the morning. Their store is located in Valsequillo, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
partners.saavedra: Ferretería Saavedra is a store that specializes in paint, with personalized treatment. They are also a leader in the area with 3.000m2 of showroom including hardware, household goods and decoration. Visit them in Puerto del Rosario, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
partners.ferrocour: Boasting a wide variety of homegoods, construction and hardware material in general. Their specialty is direct and highly qualified treatment, understanding that the client is always the most important.Located in Playa Blanca, Lanzarote.
partners.germanMedina: A consolidated company led by its second generation who are experts in bathrooms, ceramics and paint. They also have a large fleet of vehicles in order to offer an efficient transportation service. Their stores are located in the Polígono de Vecindario and in Arinaga in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
partners.sanIsidro: They stand out especially for their construction materials, woods, hardware, DIY, bathrooms, ceramics and home appliances.Founded in 1981 as Ferretería San Isidro, a small family-run business well-known in the county of Los Realejos, before becoming the Grupo San Isidro in 2006.They offer two sales points within the county of Los Realejos; one on Calle Los Barros and the second on Calle Trinidad.
partners.fraper: Comercial Fraper is a store that stands out in its sector on the island of La Palma. They are committed to service management and professionalism.Currently, they offer two sales points; one in San Andres y Sauces with a 600m2 showroom and 1100m2 of warehouse space and the other in El Paso with a 4.430 m2 showroom and 4.430m2 of warehouse space.
partners.sevenca: Grufercan’s own brand that was created with the objective of offering different product lines that prioritize the price-quality balance. This is a clear commitment to improving the positioning of each of the partners in today's increasingly competitive market. We’ve created various product lines including, heaters, shower partitions, home stairs and concrete mixers and we are continuing to work to include new lines soon.
partners.ferreteriaucanca: Located in the Tenerife town of San Isidro, on Avenue José Gonzalález Rivas, the new hardware store Ucanca boasts over 1.100m2, divided between a large sales area and warehouse, in an establishment intended for both professional and private clients, adapting its offer to each of these groups with more than 35,000 references.  The sections are well structured and interrelated: tools, plumbing, painting, kitchenware, PAE, machinery, wood, decoration, hardware, locksmith, safety and work clothes, lighting, bathrooms, electricity, adhesives, etc. It also has a 'showroom' area dedicated to bathrooms, which includes an extensive selection of cabinets and mirrors, as well as faucets.
partners.fergres: Located on the Carretera General de Guaza, Las Galletas, with over a 30 year presence, it offers a wide range of ceramic, porcelain, rustic, tile and special piece floor and wall tiles, also including free freight transport. In its facilities you can also find a wide range of bathroom accessories, furniture, faucets and divider screens.

text.paragraph1: At Grufercan we are a purchasing and services group in the hardware sector, with a management model based on facilitating the development of our partners' commercial activity. We promote this through the acquisition of products that allow a more competitive, differentiated and profitable positioning within their area of influence.
text.paragraph2: We have 12 points of sale distributed in Gran Canaria, Fuerteventura, La Palma, Lanzarote and Tenerife. We have more than 30,000 m2 of exhibition space, 50,000 m2 of storage areas and almost 200 employees who generate figures in excess of 30 million euros in annual purchases in the construction, hardware and DIY sectors.
text.paragraph3: We began our journey in 2004 on the island of Lanzarote and then continued our activity in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, where our headquarters have been located since 2015. We are currently 7 partners committed to coordinating, managing and promoting all the areas that make up the group.
text.paragraph4: Focused on commercial and product expansion, we have promoted the creation of two of our own brands:
text.paragraph5: SEVENCA, with a wide and specialised catalogue, ranging from waterproofing and paints to domestic stairs, and AMBI, which is responsible for covering the needs of our customers in the range of sanitary installations and flushing systems.
text.paragraph6: We continue to work to promote the growth of our points of sale and to offer our customers an exceptional quality-price ratio.

ambi.paragraph1: Grufercan’s own brand for sanitary products and installations, especially toilets, imported from Asia, that incorporate the 'rimless flushing' system, a discharge system that shoots water towards the edge and around the toilet bowl without leaving any free space, thus achieving total sanitation. Come and discover them in the group’s hardware stores.
